alert.note: Alert for Grant; Luna; Sierra (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 11:42AM MDT until October 24 at 12:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Grant County in southwestern New Mexico... South central Sierra County in south central New Mexico... Northeastern Luna County in southwestern New Mexico... * Until 1230 PM MDT. * At 1141 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Lake Valley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arrey, Nutt, Lake Valley, Macho Springs Wind Farm, and Cookes Peak. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico near mile markers 50 to 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
